00026 #include "LPC17xx.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_clkpwr.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"
00030 #include "lpc17xx_gpio.h"
00031 #include "lpc17xx_rtc.h"

00033 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00039 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00040 uint8_t menu[]=
00041         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00042         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00043         "Power control demo \n\r"
00044         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00045         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00046         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00047         "This example used to enter system in Deep PowerDown mode and wake up it by\n\r "
00048         "using RTC Interrupt \n\r"
00049         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00050 
00051 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00052 void print_menu(void);
00053 void RTC_IRQHandler(void);
00054 
00055 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00056 /*********************************************************************/
00061 void RTC_IRQHandler(void)
00062 {
00063         if(RTC_GetIntPending(LPC_RTC, RTC_INT_ALARM))
00064         {
00065                 RTC_ClearIntPending(LPC_RTC, RTC_INT_ALARM);
00066                 RTC_Cmd(LPC_RTC, DISABLE);
00067                 NVIC_DisableIRQ(RTC_IRQn);
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00072 /*********************************************************************/
00077 void print_menu(void)
00078 {
00079         _DBG(menu);
00080 }
00081 
00082 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00083 /*********************************************************************/
00088 int c_entry (void)
00089 {
00090 
00091         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00092          * – 115200bps
00093          * – 8 data bit
00094          * – No parity
00095          * – 1 stop bit
00096          * – No flow control
00097          */
00098         debug_frmwrk_init();
00099 
00100         // print welcome screen
00101         print_menu();
00102 
00103         /* Initialize and configure RTC */
00104         RTC_Init(LPC_RTC);
00105 
00106         RTC_ResetClockTickCounter(LPC_RTC);
00107         RTC_SetTime (LPC_RTC, RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND, 0);
00108 
00109         /* Set alarm time = 5s.
00110          * So, after each 5s, RTC will generate and wake-up system
00111          * out of Deep PowerDown mode.
00112          */
00113         RTC_SetAlarmTime (LPC_RTC, RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND, 5);
00114 
00115         RTC_CntIncrIntConfig (LPC_RTC, RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND, DISABLE);
00116         /* Set the AMR for 5s match alarm interrupt */
00117         RTC_AlarmIntConfig (LPC_RTC, RTC_TIMETYPE_SECOND, ENABLE);
00118         RTC_ClearIntPending(LPC_RTC, RTC_INT_ALARM);
00119 
00120         _DBG_("Press '1' to enter system in Deep PowerDown mode");
00121         while(_DG !='1');
00122 
00123         RTC_Cmd(LPC_RTC, ENABLE);
00124         NVIC_EnableIRQ(RTC_IRQn);
00125 
00126         _DBG_("Enter Deep PowerDown mode...");
00127         _DBG_("Wait 5s, RTC will wake-up system...\n\r");
00128 
00129         // Enter target power down mode
00130         CLKPWR_DeepPowerDown();
00131 
00132         while(1);
00133         return 1;
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00138    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00139    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00140    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00141    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00142 int main(void)
00143 {
00144     return c_entry();
00145 }

00153 * @return               None

00156 {
00157         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00158          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00159

00161         while(1);
00162 }
